name: Groundplay VR
description:
Welcome to the exciting sandbox world of GroundPlay in VR! Dodge toy cars, ride boats, enter sand castles and watch out for the bombs. Dig for gold or maybe just dig around for fun!

FEATURES:
- Fully deformable terrain, each game is unique
- Live the exciting life of a cereal box toy
- Collect over 75 crunchy characters
- Leave your mark on sand, snow, mud and ice
